channel.title: 2014 on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in 2014 on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Tote
item.description: So far away The sun beams Steal us away In concrete gutters We skip and play So wasted You sell houses And I am a wealthy Prospective buyer We stroll down heavy Streets and look over Cobble-stone driveways Maybe we’ll find a match And will live happily ever After and after Oh look a church How saintly and Majestic Shelled in stained glass We walk around but Do not enter

item.title: Two
item.description: Encased in Her desire I am dressed in Mire. Second-face Throughport Who has second center? Would you like to sleep? Essence, pre-absorbed. She’s in my hind-center. Images are cheap A dozen, so to speak. A mouthpiece is necessary Will you marry me? The secret is out Without a doubt. And a stop goes to A cottonmouth. No play To this day We are in the south Don’t bounce.

item.title: Slang
item.description: Do you hear the sway Of guns and heart Of wishes and mantles Of death and start.

item.title: Slight
item.description: when the lovers dance And are swept by Guiding glances of Sad sunlight The gods simple mocking Of afternoon pleasures Holidays that are never Realized. They Came to stay. Led astray. They Lie awake. Stranded takes. Misty ghosts dance upon Misty houses broken down They laugh and flee. There is no glee. A coward’s paradise.

item.title: Marks
item.description: This is my notebook. There are many like this one. But this one is mine. With this notebook. I can alight realms. And destroy a people. I am a fleshy weight Bundled in tome.

item.title: Please
item.description: She breathes in my opposite Counterbearing to my darewit, She billows in gallows far from me. And I, in esteem, carry streets of dreams Collective arms and nations. Breathe. I am the ends of me. D96 Premonitions are not unlost. We peer into the sanctuary. We are in the posthaste mortuary. Songs are written, foes are beaten. Adversaries tell the tale, warriors ring the bell. Short-timers sell, Cretans foretell. An ocean for a lover, Conscious compromise.

item.title: Break
item.description: She stirs in the wind. She sits at my foot and we drift. In consecrated skies, we kiss. She is no home to me. She is so mean to me. Judged, on a half-steak makes me break. I ascend into Her calm. She takes me as I am. She is no savior. And when I commune with Her, Universes dissipate with Bright. She teaches how to hold my sword. And I learn how to make my word.

item.title: Ton
item.description: Into me. Breathe. q. Breathe deep. I construct theis guy. Neurotic hackery? A piece of me. Is there anything wrong? Is there anything right? Of f to the ocorner of ahthatht guy. Let’s’ hit that; Let’s do. I might migraine to the 2nd soul. I might be in your room. In our room. I omight. Sencidn., Interview.

item.title: Bow
item.description: When She kisses my moonlight, I hide in burrowed screams. And I, in my own light. Know Her sunbeams. My worthless plight of day. Her might of play. Taunting. The Earth bends below Her. It sings joyed terror. And I, in my dance. Lurch in acquiesce. Stupidity rinses my strength away. Down such a gloried fade. Days of promise seem so far away. No angels stand near. Knocks of wine. Colors spin so fine.

item.title: T
item.description: To give carely. To receive bountifully. We are the psychology of you. And us. The aisles of contempt. And anguish. Your Love is here. Be clear. The trips of dreams In me. The obsession of wealth. The obsession of Time. The trips within me Are beam. A smoky horizon, Breeding impermanence. A dangerous occupation. In the flesh, You’re letting your work run in. The work runs in within I’ll trail after that.
